statements: SELECT * FROM songs ORDER BY artist_name ASC, release_year DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, album_name FROM songs WHERE release_year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE artist_name = 'Taylor Swift' OR artist_name = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT song_title, release_year FROM songs WHERE album_name LIKE 'Best%';
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM songs ORDER BY artist_name;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY song_title DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, release_year FROM songs WHERE artist_name = 'Taylor Swift' AND album_name = 'Fearless';
SELECT song_title, artist_name, album_name FROM songs WHERE release_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000 ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Beyoncé%' OR artist_name LIKE 'Rihanna%';
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS song_count FROM songs GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY song_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM songs;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, release_year FROM songs;
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM songs WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT * FROM lyrics WHERE language='English';
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM songs ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, release_year FROM songs WHERE artist_name = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE release_year > 2010 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT song_name, lyric_text, language FROM songs JOIN lyrics ON songs.song_id = lyrics.song_id WHERE songs.artist_name LIKE 'Taylor Swift' AND lyrics.language IN ('English', 'Spanish');
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(song_id) AS song_count FROM songs GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(song_id) > 2;
SELECT artist_name, AVG(release_year) AS avg_release_year FROM songs GROUP BY artist_name ORDER BY avg_release_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM songs;
SELECT title, artist, release_date FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists ORDER BY debut_year DESC;
SELECT album_title, genre FROM albums WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT song_id, title, artist FROM songs WHERE artist = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE artist = 'Adele' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT song_id, title, artist FROM songs WHERE album = '25' AND release_date > '2015-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, debut_year FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'British' AND debut_year < 2000 ORDER BY debut_year;
SELECT album_title, genre FROM albums WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, album_title, release_date FROM artists INNER JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist WHERE artist_name = 'Taylor Swift';
SELECT * FROM Songs;
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM Songs WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT song_title, album_name, artist_name FROM Songs ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT playlist_name, created_date FROM Playlists WHERE DATE(created_date) = '2022-10-15';
SELECT song_title, artist_name, genre_name FROM Songs JOIN Genres ON Songs.song_id = Genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM Songs WHERE release_year = 2020 ORDER BY song_title DESC;
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM Songs WHERE artist_name LIKE 'J%' AND album_name = 'Best Hits' ORDER BY artist_name, song_title;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, album_name, release_year FROM Songs JOIN Genres ON Songs.song_id = Genres.genre_id WHERE genre_name = 'Pop';
SELECT Playlist_name, created_date FROM Playlists WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, lyrics_text FROM Songs JOIN Lyrics ON Songs.song_id = Lyrics.song_id WHERE LENGTH(lyrics_text) > 500 ORDER BY song_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM Songs;
SELECT song_title, artist, release_year FROM Songs WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT artist, album, release_year FROM Songs ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM Ratings WHERE rating_score >= 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT playlist_name, created_at FROM Playlists WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Songs WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT song_title, artist, album FROM Songs WHERE genre='Pop';
SELECT song_title, artist, release_year, genre FROM Songs WHERE artist='Ed Sheeran' ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT song_title, artist, album FROM Songs WHERE genre='Rock' AND album='Greatest Hits';
SELECT song_title, artist, release_year, genre FROM Songs INNER JOIN Ratings ON Songs.song_id = Ratings.song_id WHERE Ratings.rating_score > 4 ORDER BY release_year ASC;
